events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
A dedicated recruiter for engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled to assess your technical skills and fit with our engineering team.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the initial screening interview at the proposed time.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer role on May 20th at 2 PM.
Your technical interview concluded successfully, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
The HR interview for further discussion on culture fit and compensation has been scheduled for May 23rd.
The HR interview finished, and overall feedback was very positive about your communication and company fit.
We are excited to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive benefits.
We have received your positive feedback and acceptance of the offer terms presented.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are thrilled to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including setup of systems, access to documentation, and team introductions.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role is now officially closed with your successful onboarding.
